item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Save yourself. The emo alert levels on my server are always red.
How much the bank held depends on who you talk to: the penniless officers and their asslicking society claim THOUSANDS OF GOLD. (O NOES!) The bank guy said it was much less -- typical endgame bank, lots of enchanting supplies, molten core components, etc.
item.content:encoded:
Save yourself. The emo alert levels on my server are always red.

How much the bank held depends on who you talk to: the penniless officers and their asslicking society claim THOUSANDS OF GOLD. (O NOES!) The bank guy said it was much less — typical endgame bank, lots of enchanting supplies, molten core components, etc.

item.title: By: Krones
item.dc:creator: Krones
item.description: haha, I bet. I need to play on your server and follow your guild around, never a dull moment! How much gold did he plunder?
item.content:encoded: haha, I bet. I need to play on your server and follow your guild around, never a dull moment! How much gold did he plunder?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I think the guildbank dude said something along the lines of ... you can have your bank back when I get all that raiding time back.
Since the entire argument took place in public, it was very entertaining.
item.content:encoded:
I think the guildbank dude said something along the lines of … you can have your bank back when I get all that raiding time back.

Since the entire argument took place in public, it was very entertaining.
